name: Quantum Tether
description:
Made in 9 days for Godot Wild Jam, May 2020!

Explore a mysterious world with a magical sword and tether by your side!

Controls: Keyboard Controls:

    Move:  WASD
   Jump: Space
   Attack:  Left Mouse Button
   Tether: Right Mouse Button
   Pause: Escape
   Fullscreen: Alt + Enter / F11

Gamepad Controls:

    Move:  Left Stick
   Jump: A
   Attack:  Right Trigger / B
   Tether: Left Trigger / X
   Pause: Start
   Fullscreen: Alt + Enter / F11

Patches:

Patch 4:

  • Fixed bug which prevented the game from running outside of debug mode

Patch 3:

  • Fixed bug for infinitely repeating sound effect

Patch 2:

  • Fixed bugs causing some particles to not spawn
  • Fixed bug preventing the pause screen from functioning

Patch 1:

  • Re-uploaded with debug mode to make the game playable.
